package.name: MacOS Microsoft PowerPoint
package.releaseNotes: Get suggestions from Copilot as you work: Introducing structured content suggestions for slides while creating in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide, choose a slide from the Design Suggestions pane and add in your own content.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft Outlook
package.releaseNotes:
Resolved Issues: • Mail: Fixed an issue where contact card details weren't loading when clicking on a contact's name. • Mail: Fixed an issue where emails are not grouped in conversation in legacy Outlook client. • Mail: Fixed an issue in Outlook where the draft email window would unexpectedly disappear while typing in the body. • Calendar: Fixed an issue in Outlook where the calendar sidebar selection was not retained after closing the application using the traffic light.
Feature Updates: • Attachment: Allow users to download a link and attach it as a local attachment. • Attachment: Allow users to upload large-size files to OneDrive and attach them as links. • Signatures: You can now deploy managed preferences to disable the default signature. Details available here. • Copilot Summarise default language has been updated to use the content language of the conversation. User has an option in the summarise card to switch to UI language if required. • Themes by Copilot: enable users to personalise their Outlook app with AI-generated themes that are unique to them, based on their favourite styles and contexts. • Mail: Sort by categories allows users to organise and view emails based on categories, making it easier to locate and manage related emails efficiently. • Contacts: A new unified experience of Contacts with Teams is now available.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft OneNote
package.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.
Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience.
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app by clicking on the feedback icon in the top-right of the app. Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

package.name: MacOS Microsoft OneDrive
package.releaseNotes: Thank you for using OneDrive. We are always looking to update OneDrive to bring you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes for the best experience.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft Windows App
package.releaseNotes:
In this release we made the following updates:
• Fixed slurred audio that was being rendered when using Teams optimizations. • Added a connecting/connected state indicator to workspace headers. • Fixed some bad code that was corrupting app icons displayed in workspaces. • Added the ability to switch between remote apps from the Window menu and Dock icon. • Improved threading for the graphics decoder to improve performance. • Resolved z-order issues between remote apps and local windows. • Fixed a bug that caused incorrect mouse coordinates to be sent if the session window was resized while reconnecting.
If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Help > Submit Feedback.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft To-Do
package.releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs to improve the app experience.

package.name: MacOS Microsoft Azure VPN Client
package.releaseNotes: Added auto reconnect on VPN connections for intermittent/ server failures. Added notification which notifies user to install rosetta in case its not installed in arm machines. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
